name: Flying Knives
description:
Game for the Jame Gam #14

Theme: Fight or Flight
Special Object: Sword / Knife

You are the best knife thrower in the circus and together with your partner the dwarf you have been entrusted with the most important task of the entire circus, which is to attract customers, for this you must use your faithful companion as a target and perfectly control your knife throw.

Assets

Low Poly Amusement Park Isometric Icon

Free Stylised Fantasy Weapons

Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack

SIMPLE modular human

Music

Circus music
